title: Submission
description: You are tasked with creating a research report that will equip Economy Tire with the most up-to-date information about the semi-truck tire industry, detailed customer profiles, and actionable insights for targeting truck drivers effectively in different regions. The recommendations should guide the client in online marketing strategy to achieve sustainable growth and success in the e-commerce landscape for semi-truck tires.

title: Awards
description:
The winning participants will be able to publish their research on the Initia Website.

The top application will be able to work with Economy Tires to implement their research study.

title: Team
description: Submissions are to be done as a team. Each team will consist of 2-6 members

title: Judges
description: The solutions will be judged by Economy Tire for their cost efficiency, practicality , effectiveness, scalability, customer Impact.
